title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart shall apply to all fire loss claims made on and after April 1, 1982 on policies insuring against the peril of fire on real and personal property in this State, except fire losses to motor vehicles registered for use on public highways. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
62-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
